metadata.title: grafana: missing access control allows test alerts by underprivileged user (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in grafana. This issue may allow a malicious user to craft a request to the API that enables them to send alert messages via the "API Alert - Test". 
            STATEMENT: OpenShift ServiceMesh (OSSM) has switched to using upstream rhel rpms for grafana, and is no longer maintaining the servicemesh-grafana package. Hence, it is marked as affected/won'tfix.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
grafana is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
